explains: n. 投标人；出价人；命令者
wordGroup: successful bidder 投标中的得标人

sentences.en: The sale will be made to the highest bidder subject to a reserve price being attained.
sentences.cn: 在保证底价的条件下，出售给出价最高者。

sentences.en: The bidder view table is therefore decoupled and not always consistent with the state of the bid table.
sentences.cn: 出价人视图数据表因此而解耦，但不总是与出价表的状态保持一致。

sentences.en: There is the problem of illegal excavation, resulting in museum-quality pieces being sold to the highest bidder.
sentences.cn: 存在非法挖掘的问题，这导致博物馆级别的作品被卖给出价最高的人。
